i2p.susi.util.ReadCounter

  • Packages that use ReadCounter 
    Package Description
    i2p.susi.util  
    i2p.susi.webmail
    The SusiMail webapp, which implements a webmail interface, POP3 and SMTP client-side protocols, and local caching of email.

      An InputStream that implements ReadCounter.

      Limit total reads and skips to a specified maximum, then return EOF
